titles.title: Recognizing Helen Thomas for her pioneering career as a woman in journalism, her lifelong commitment to journalistic independence as an essential pillar of American democracy, and her unflagging and honest coverage of every President of the United States since John F. Kennedy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/11/2009--Introduced. Recognizes Helen Thomas for her pioneering career as a woman in journalism, her lifelong commitment to journalistic independence, and her unflagging and honest coverage of every President of the United States since John F. Kennedy.
